Plot: Three wives engage the services of a private investigator after they suspect their respective husbands of infidelity.
Title: Thank You
Writer: Rajan Aggarwal (screenplay), Ikram Akhtar (screen play), Nisar Akhtar, Anees Bazmee, Amitabh Bhattacharya (lyrics), Kumaar (lyrics), Ashiesh Pandit (lyrics)
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Bobby Deol, Sonam Kapoor, Sunil Shetty
